English: You've been floating around like this all the time. Aren't you tired?
Chinese: 你一直这样飘着，不累吗？

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
...You don't even doubt the fact that I'm flying right now?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
……你竟然一点都不怀疑我正在飞着的事实吗。

English: There are many odd people in the Ark, and many with special abilities. So I've gotten used to it.
Chinese: 方舟里有很多怪人，也有很多人有特殊的能力，所以我已经习惯了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
I’m concerned about the environment you grew up in...
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
我对你的成长环境担忧啊……

English:
[b]It’s coming back to me.
As hard as it is to believe.[/b]
Chinese:
[b]想起来了。
虽然不敢相信。[/b]

English:
[b]What is the meaning of my existence?
What was the point of all my efforts all this time?[/b]
Chinese:
[b]我存在的意义是什么。
我一直以来的努力又算什么。[/b]

English: ...Mokou...
Mokou!
Chinese: 妹红！

English:
*Mokou
[sh]Huh?! Lucy, you called me?
Chinese:
*妹红
[sh]嗯？！露西你叫我啊。

English:
The moment we entered this bamboo forest, you suddenly fell silent, deep in thought.
It’s just like—how you were in the Archives.
Chinese:
一进到这个竹林里，你就突然一言不发，一副若有所思的样子。
就像是——在档案馆里的样子呢。

English:
I don’t know what you’ve been through in the past…
Or what you saw in the Archives…
Chinese:
我不知道你过去都经历了什么…
也不知道你在档案馆里看到了什么…

English: But if we give up now, we’ll never return to the real world.
Chinese: 但是如果我们就这样放弃，就永远无法回到现实世界了。

English:
*Mokou
Wouldn’t it be fine to…not go back?
Why must we return to the real world?
Chinese:
*妹红
不回去，不也挺好的吗？
为什么我们一定要回到现实世界呢？

English:
*Mokou
Couldn’t we stay here forever?
I think things are just fine as they are now.
Chinese:
*妹红
永远地待在这里不也是可以的吗？
我觉得现在这样就挺好的。

English: You…don’t want to leave?
Chinese: 你…不想出去吗？

English:
*Mokou
...It’s not that I don’t want to leave. I can’t leave.
Chinese:
*妹红
……我不是不想出去，我是不能出去。

English:
...Back in the Archives, you said you weren’t the real Mokou.
If something’s troubling you, you can discuss it with me.
Chinese:
……之前在档案馆时你就说过，你不是妹红什么的。
如果你有什么困扰的，都可以和我商量。

English:
*Mokou
...

*Mokou
I told you a story before, right?
Would you…like to hear its conclusion?
Chinese:
*妹红
我之前，跟你讲过一个故事对吧。
你愿意，听完这个故事的后续吗？

English: Yes (nods)
Chinese: 嗯（点头）

English:
*Mokou
In the first three hundred years after gaining immortality, the girl was despised by humans, living a wretched life where hiding was the only way to avoid bringing trouble to herself and others.
Chinese:
*妹红
在成为不死之身的最初三百年里，女孩被人类所厌恶，过着不躲起来就会给自己和周围带来麻烦的悲惨生活。

English:
*Mokou
For the next three hundred years, the girl hated the world. Whether encountering youkai or anything else, she would immediately subdue them to maintain her fading sense of self.
Chinese:
*妹红
接下来的三百年，女孩痛恨这个世界，遇到妖怪也好不管什么也好，都会马上将对方降伏，以此来维持她那变得很稀薄的自我意识。

English:
*Mokou
In the following three hundred years, no youkai in the area could match her, and she lost interest in everything, consumed by boredom.
Chinese:
*妹红
再接下来的三百年，这周围的妖怪都不是女孩的对手了，而且她也对任何事物都失去了兴趣，开始感到非常的无聊。

English:
*Mokou
In the next three hundred years, she finally met her immortal rival again, finding purpose in their endless battles.
Chinese:
*妹红
再接下来的三百年，女孩终于再次见到了不死的宿敌，并在相互死斗之中找到了乐趣。

English:
*Mokou
Now, human society has gradually accepted her existence. Using her accumulated experience and battle-honed skills, she works as a guardian for humans.
Chinese:
*妹红
而到了现在，人类社会对于女孩的存在已经逐渐适应。她也凭借着自己多年来积累的经验和经过不断战斗获得的能力担任着人类的护卫工作。

English:
*Mokou
The gratitude from humans—something she never received before—now fuels her will to live. Gensokyo, a place unafraid of immortals, has become her paradise.
Chinese:
*妹红
那些以前从来都不会得到的来自人类的感谢，现在是支撑她生存下去的动力。不害怕不死之人的幻想乡对她而言就如同乐园。

English: If that’s the case…why don’t you want to return to the real world, to that Gensokyo?
Chinese: 既然这样……为什么你不愿意回到现实里，那个叫幻想乡的地方呢？

English:
*Mokou
What I just told you is the story of Fujiwara no Mokou, the Hourai immortal.
...What I’ll say next is my story.
Chinese:
*妹红
刚刚我说的，是名为藤原妹红的蓬莱人的故事。
……接下来我要说的，就是我的故事。

English:
*Mokou
A catastrophic disaster, similar to the global freeze, struck Gensokyo.
Almost instantly, the entire realm was swallowed.
Chinese:
*妹红
类似全球冻结一样，一场毁灭性的灾难降临到了幻想乡。
几乎是一瞬间，整个幻想乡被瞬间吞没了。

English:
*Mokou
But someone foresaw this calamity.
Though powerless to stop it, she used the power of two Hourai immortals to create perfect replicas—Hourai Dolls.
Chinese:
*妹红
但是，有人预见到了这场灾难的降临。
虽然她也无力阻止这场灾难，但她借助两位蓬莱人的力量，造出来她们的完美复制体——蓬莱人形。

English: You mean…you’re a Hourai Doll?
Chinese: 你的意思是……你是蓬莱人形？

English:
*Mokou
Pathetic, isn’t it? My abilities are borrowed, my memories are borrowed—everything about me is borrowed.
I’m just an empty shell with Mokou’s appearance… What meaning does my existence hold?
Chinese:
*妹红 
很可笑吧……我的能力是别人的，记忆是别人的，我的一切都是别人的。
我只是有着藤原妹红外表的一个空壳……我究竟有什么存在的意义呢。

English:
...I don’t understand.
I don’t know this Gensokyo you speak of, nor the Fujiwara no Mokou from there.
Chinese:
……我不明白。
我不知道你说的幻想乡是哪里，也不认识你说的那个幻想乡的藤原妹红。

English:
The Mokou I know is the one from the Distortion Land Investigation Team.
The one who shields her allies in battle, standing alone against all threats.
Chinese:
我认识的，只是扭曲之地调查团里的那个妹红小姐。
是会在战斗时将同伴保护在身后，自己一个人挡住所有人的妹红小姐。

English: She worries about her immortal power, joined the team for others’ sake, and would risk everything for her comrades.
Chinese: 她会因为自己的不死的力量而烦恼，会因为周围的人而加入调查团，也会为了调查团的同伴们而赴汤蹈火。

English: Even if everything about you is artificial, your actions are real. You’ve genuinely impacted every member of the team.
Chinese: 即使你的一切都是虚伪的，但是你的所作所为都是真实的，你切切实实地影响到了调查团的每一个人。

English: Though this world we’re in is also artificial… Even if we leave and return to reality, everything we’ve experienced here remains tangible.
Chinese: 虽然我们现在的这个世界也都是虚伪的……但即使我们离开了这里，回到了现实，我们所经历过的一切都是切实存在过的。

English:
You’ve truly acted as a investigator, doing what you chose to do.
To us, you’re utterly uniq…[auto0.5]
Chinese:
你确确实实地作为一个调查员，做出了你自己想做的事。
对我们来说，你就是独一无……[auto0.5]

English:
*???
Mokou… So this is where you’ve been!
I finally found you…
Chinese:
*???
妹红……原来你在这里啊！
我终于找到你了……

English:
*Mokou
Kaguya?! How are you here?
Chinese:
*妹红
辉夜？！你怎么会在这里的？

English:
*Houraisan Kaguya
You know our old rule.
If you want answers, defeat me first!
Chinese:
*蓬莱山辉夜
你知道我们的老规矩。
想知道发生了什么，就先打败我吧！

English:
*Mokou
Tch.
Get ready, Lucy. She’s no ordinary foe.
Chinese:
*妹红
啧。
做好准备，露西。她可不是一般的敌人。

English:
*Kaguya
Ahaha, I yield, I yield.
Haven’t exerted myself like this in ages—every part of me aches.
Chinese:
*辉夜
哎呀，输了输了。
真是好久没有怎么大动干戈了，感觉浑身都在酸痛。

English:
*Mokou
Serves you right for attacking without explanation…
Chinese:
*妹红
还不是因为你不分青红皂白地直接动手……

English: So…who is she?
Chinese: 所以，她是？

English:
*Mokou
As mentioned in the story, she’s that Kaguya—the one who left behind the Hourai Elixir.
Chinese:
*妹红
我记得故事中有提到过，她就是那个辉夜，留下了蓬莱之药的人。

English:
*Kaguya
My, my. Mokou actually sharing her past? How rare.
Chinese:
*辉夜
啊啦啊啦，妹红竟然会给别人讲以前的故事，真是稀奇呢。

English:
*Mokou
...Do you even grasp our current situation?
Chinese:
*妹红
……你到底知不知道我们现在的处境。

English:
*Kaguya
Hmph, you think this is my first time encountering you in this loop?
It’s just an endless cyclical world. Escape it, and be done.
Chinese:
*辉夜
哼，你以为我是第几次遇见你们了。
不就是无尽循环的世界嘛，离开这里不就好了。

English:
*Mokou
No! We can’t leave. We should stay here forever!
Chinese:
*妹红
不！我们不能出去，我们应该一辈子待在这里！

English:
*Kaguya
Sigh… In the end, it’s you who needs convincing.
Chinese:
*辉夜
唉……结果最后要说服的，是你吗。

English:
*Kaguya
Hey, Mokou. Do you know what I meant by "You think this is my first time encountering you"?
Chinese:
*辉夜
呐，妹红。你知道我说的“你以为我是第几次遇见你们了”代表了什么呢。

English:
*Mokou
?
Chinese:
*妹红
？

English:
*Kaguya
In other words, I’ve already met Kaguya.
Chinese:
*辉夜
也就是说，我已经见到过辉夜了呢。

English:
*Mokou
You! Are you saying—
Chinese:
*妹红
你！你是说——

English:
*Kaguya
Glad to see your brain’s still working.
Who’s the real one? It’s obvious at a glance.
Chinese:
*辉夜
看来你脑子还是有在动的嘛。
谁是真的本体，这种事，真的是看一眼就知道了呢。

English:
*Mokou
Then why do you want to end the cycle?!
Chinese:
*妹红
既然这样，为什么你还要终结循环！

English:
*Kaguya
Heh. You’re nothing like a Hourai immortal.
What you fear isn’t death outside this loop, is it?
Chinese:
*辉夜
呵呵，你这样，真是一点都不像一个蓬莱人呢。
你害怕的，从始至终就不是出去以后我们会死吧。

English:
*Mokou
...

*Kaguya
You don’t want to break the cycle because you can’t bear losing the bonds forged here in the Ark.
Chinese:
*辉夜
不要结束循环，其实只是你不想破坏在这个方舟中积累下来的点点滴滴吧。

English: M-Mokou…?
Chinese: 妹……妹红小姐？

English:
*Mokou
Sigh… Yes. I’m terrified that everything will vanish once we leave.
I fear all I’ve done and experienced will become meaningless.
Chinese:
*妹红
呼————是啊，我就是在害怕着，出去以后，这一切都会消失。
我害怕我所做的这一切，我所经历的这一切都化为泡影。

English: No! It won’t disappear!
Chinese: 不！不会消失的！

English:
*Mokou
Lucy?
Chinese:
*妹红
露西？

English:
Miss Mokou… You’ve always protected me, no matter how dangerous the enemy.
I’ll never forget what we’ve been through!
Chinese:
妹红小姐……你一直在保护着我，不管是多危险的敌人。
我是绝对不会忘记那些和你的那些经历的！

English:
Not just me—the entire Investigation Team.
Everyone will remember you!
Chinese:
不单单是我，还有调查团的同伴。
大家都一定会记得你的！

English:
The bonds we share here and now are real.
You’ve always been our one and only Miss Mokou!
Chinese:
此刻在一起的我们，是千真万确的同伴。
你一直都是我们唯一的，妹红小姐啊！

English:
*Kaguya
My, my. How touching~
Chinese:
*辉夜
啊啦啊啦，真是令人羡慕啊~

English:
I know my words might sound hollow…
I don’t even know if we’ll wake up or what awaits us.
Chinese:
虽然我知道我现在说的话都不靠谱……
我其实根本不知道我们能不能醒来，我们醒来以后会怎么样。

English:
…I’m scared too. Scared to face it all.
But I have no choice.
Chinese:
…我也在害怕着啊，害怕着去面对这一切。
但我没有别的选择。

English:
*Mokou
…How pathetic. Getting lectured by a kid.
Chinese:
*妹红
…我也真是逊啊，竟然都要轮到小孩子来开导我了。

English:
*Mokou
I won’t hesitate anymore.
I’m not Fujiwara no Mokou’s shadow—I am myself!
Chinese:
*妹红
我已经不会再迷茫了。
我不是什么藤原妹红的替身，我就是我自己！

English:
*Mokou
Let’s go, Lucy. Do what you must.
I’ll always stand in front of you.
Chinese:
*妹红
走吧，露西，去做你想做的事。
我会一直站在你的身前的。

English:
*Kaguya
Though I can’t help much, I’ll still cheer you on~
Chinese:
*辉夜
虽然我帮不了你们什么，我也会为你们加油的哦~

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
We’re here… This is the Clock Tower.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
到了吗……这里就是钟楼啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
A journey neither long nor short.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
真是说长不长，说短也不短的旅程啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Regardless, I’ll remember this trip forever.
…Even if time rewinds and erases it.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
不管怎么说，我会永远记住这一次的旅途的。
……虽然时光倒流后也记不住就是了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
For me, nothing changes.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
对我来说，一切都没有改变就是了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
A mere few decades is but a drop in the ocean of my existence.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
区区几十年的时光，和我的经历比起来真是沧海一粟。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Hm? Saying I’m not that old?
Heh. Even if I told you, you’d forget.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
嗯？你说我也没多大？
呵呵，就算我跟你说你也记不住吧。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
A unique journey. I’ll cherish it.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
蛮特别的一段旅程，我会一直铭记在心的。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Either way, we’re friends now, right Lucy?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
无论怎么说，露西你已经是我的朋友了，不是吗？

English: About future plans
Chinese: 关于今后的计划

English: Ask for her thoughts
Chinese: 询问感想

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Go, Lucy.
Farewell—I hope we meet again.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
去吧，露西。
后会有期，希望我们还能再见面。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Oh! My favorite liquor!
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
哦！这不是我最喜欢的酒嘛！

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Huh? You’re really giving this to me?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
欸？你真的要送给我吗？

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Ah, thanks Lucy…
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
啊，谢谢你露西……

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
But don’t you dare drink any. Wait till you’re older.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
不过露西你可不能喝啊，等你长大了才能喝酒。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Me? I’ve lived far longer than I look.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
我吗？我可比你看起来要活得久多了呢。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Hm? This is for me?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
嗯？這是給我的嗎？

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Well, I’ll gratefully accept it.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
嘛，总之我就心怀感激的收下了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Kid, stay behind me in battle.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
小子，戰鬥的時候記得躲在我身後啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
After defeating him… this journey ends, huh.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
打败他之后，这段旅程也就结束了吗……

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Either way, it’s been unforgettable.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
不管怎么说，都是一段难忘的旅程呢。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Let’s finish this, Lucy!
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
让我们上吧，露西！

English: [b](Fujiwara no Mokou is smoking alone, away from the campfire.)[/b]
Chinese: [b]（藤原妹红在远离火堆的地方独自一人抽着烟）[/b]

English: Miss Fujiwara, why are you out here alone?
Chinese: 藤原小姐，你为什么一个人呆在这种地方呢？

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Just call me Mokou, Lucy.
I’m… simply lost in thought.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
是露西啊……叫我妹红就好。
我只是在独自发呆罢了。

English: Wouldn’t it be better to sit by the fire, Miss Mokou? It’s warm here.
Chinese: 那妹红小姐来火堆这边坐着不好吗，这边还很暖和呢。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
"Miss"... Never mind, call me what you like.
I can conjure flames. Cold doesn’t bother me.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
小姐……算了你开心就好。
我可以凭空生火，根本不会怕冷的啊。

English:
You’re so distant with others, Miss Mokou.
Someone who controls fire should be more passionate.
Chinese:
妹红小姐对待别人好冷淡耶。
会玩火的不应该都很热情的嘛。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
What a stereotype…
But I have a question for you, Lucy.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
你这是什么刻板印象啊……
不过我倒是想问露西你一个问题就是了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Aren’t you afraid of me? I’m an ageless, deathless being.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
露西你不害怕我吗？我可是不会老去也不会死亡的存在哦。

English: Huh? You’re always shielding us in battle! So cool~~ I’m not scared at all!
Chinese:
欸——妹红小姐在战场上一直站在前面挡住敌人的攻击，保护身后的人耶。
多帅气啊~~我一点都不怕妹红小姐啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Sigh… Your innocence is refreshing.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
唉，露西你能这么纯真真是好啊。

English:
Ah… The way you take all the damage alone frightens me.
Maybe trust the others more next time?
Chinese:
啊，妹红小姐每次一个人承受所有伤害的样子我看着很害怕啊。
下次也相信别的调查员一些怎么样。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
That’s not what I meant…
But you’re not wrong.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
我说的不是这个啊……
算了，你说的也有一点道理。

English:
Hmm… I don’t know.
But you’re part of the team helping me restart the Clock Tower. You can’t be bad.
Chinese:
嗯……我不知道。
但是妹红小姐也是调查员中的一员，会帮助我一起启动钟楼，不可能是坏人吧。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Sigh… Your purity is rare.
I wish everyone were like you.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
唉……露西你还真是纯真啊。
要是人们都能像你一样就好了。

English: Not afraid
Chinese: 不害怕

English: Afraid
Chinese: 害怕

English: I don’t know
Chinese: 我不知道

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
People fear my power yet can’t oppose me.
In the end, they shun and exile me.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
人们惧怕我的力量，又对我无可奈何。
最后也只能做到惧怕我，远离我，驱逐我。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
So joining the Investigation Team to explore the Distortion Lands was the best choice.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
既然这样的话，加入调查团，前往扭曲之地进行调查就是一个不错的选择嘛。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
My power finds purpose here, and I avoid those who despise me. A fair trade.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
我的力量也能有地方发挥，还能远离那些讨厌我的人，不是一个不错的选择吗？

English: You’re so kind, Miss Mokou. No resentment despite how others treat you?
Chinese: 妹红小姐你是真的心善啊，人们这么对待你你都没有怨言啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
This is normal for me. I’m used to it.
You should rest, Lucy. We’ve more to explore.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
一直都是这样过来的而已，我也已经习惯了。
话说露西你也该回去休息了，我们还要继续探索扭曲之地呢。

English: [b]Mokou extinguishes her cigarette and returns to the campfire. She seems unwilling to continue the conversation.[/b]
Chinese:
[b]藤原妹红掐灭了手中的烟，走回到了篝火旁。
看起来她并不是很想继续这个话题。[/b]

English: [b](Fujiwara no Mokou is smoking alone again, away from the campfire.)[/b]
Chinese: [b]（藤原妹红又在远离火堆的地方独自一人抽着烟了）[/b]

English: Miss Mokou, why are you out here alone again?
Chinese: 妹红小姐，你怎么又一个人呆在这种地方了啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Just reminiscing about life before the team.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
没事，只是在回忆加入调查团前的一些往事罢了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Hey, Lucy, do you like listening to stories?
I was just thinking of telling one to pass the time.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
呐，露西，你喜欢听故事吗？
我正好想讲个故事，消磨消磨时间。

English:
A story from Miss Mokou—
I’m very interested, then.
Chinese:
妹红小姐知道的故事吗——
那我可是很感兴趣了。

English: Once upon a time, there was a daughter from a noble family.
Chinese: 很久很久以前，有一个贵族人家的女儿。

English: Her existence was unknown to the world, and she herself was merely an illegitimate child who was never expected to amount to much.
Chinese: 她的存在并不为人所知，她本身也只是一个不曾被寄予厚望的孩子。也就是俗说的私生子。

English: If things had stayed that way, she would have lived an ordinary life, like any common person, passing through an unremarkable lifetime.
Chinese: 如果只是这样，那她本该平平淡淡地生活下去，就像一个普通人一样，度过平凡的一生。

English: But one day, her father suddenly proposed to a woman of lowly status, only to be humiliated by her impossible riddle. He then vanished after fleeing home.
Chinese: 可是有一天，她的父亲忽然向一位身份低微的女子求婚，却被对方以难题羞辱，随后离家出走，不见了踪影。

English: After that, her family rapidly declined. Though her daily life remained unchanged, she harbored deep hatred for the woman who had destroyed her family.
Chinese: 自那以后，她的家族迅速地衰败了。虽然对她来说，和以前的生活并无二致，但她仍然十分憎恨这个将她的家族毁掉的女人。

English: Yet as a child, there was nothing she could do—neither finding that woman nor her missing father.
Chinese: 只可惜，年幼的她什么都做不到。无论是找到那个女人，还是找到失踪的父亲，她什么都做不到。

English: At that time, she heard of a man named Iwakasa tasked with disposing of an item left behind by her.
Chinese: 就在这个时候，她听说了一件事。一个被叫做岩笠的男人受委托处理她留下了的一个东西。

English:
“Even if I can’t do anything else, stealing this thing she left behind would be my revenge!”
With that thought, she chased the group to Mount Fuji, said to be the tallest peak in the land.
Chinese:
“虽然我什么都做不到，至少夺走她留下的这个东西，也是一种报仇吧！”
这样想着的她，追逐着一行人，来到了据说是那个国家之中最高的山峰——富士山。

English:
But such a mountain was too vast for a young girl.
By the time she reached midway, exhaustion forced her to stop.
Chinese:
但是这样的一座山，对于一个小女孩来说，还是过于高大了。
当爬到半山腰时，她终于筋疲力尽，停在了原地。

English: [b]The man had noticed her following them. When she collapsed, he turned back, offered her water, and urged the soldiers to help her climb to the summit…[/b]
Chinese: [b]那名男子似乎早就注意到她一直跟在他们的后面。所以当她坐下的时候，他也返身走了过来并且递了一壶水。最后还和几名士兵一起互相激励着带她一同爬上了山顶……[/b]

English: After reaching the summit, she asked the man why they had climbed.
Chinese: 当一行人终于登上山顶之后，她便向那名男子问他们为什么要登山。

English:
*Girl
Iwakasa, why did you come here to destroy the elixir of immortality?
Chinese:
*女孩
岩笠你，为什么要来这里销毁掉不老不死药呢。

English:
*Iwakasa
This elixir was left by Princess Kaguya. The Emperor ordered me to burn it at the place closest to the moon.
Chinese:
*岩笠
这个药是辉夜姬留下了的，天皇命令我在最接近月亮的地方将灵药烧掉。

English:
*Girl
Didn’t you consider keeping it for yourself? This is the elixir of eternal life.
Chinese:
*女孩
你就没有想过要私吞这个药吗？这可是不老不死之药啊。

English:
*Iwakasa
…Do you truly believe immortality is a blessing?
Birth, aging, sickness, and death are humanity’s natural order. Defying it can’t end well.
Chinese:
*岩笠
……你真的觉得不老不死是一件好事吗？
生老病死，是一个人的自然规律。违背这个规律一定不会是好事的。

English:
*Iwakasa
Those who crave immortality are the wealthy. For the poor, this elixir is merely a tool to seize fortune and status.
Chinese:
*岩笠
希望不老不死之人都是那些生活富裕的人。对于那些贫乏的人来说，不老不死之药则是获得莫大的财富与地位的生财之药。

English: Clearly, Iwakasa and the girl spoke past each other. Exhausted, she eventually fell asleep.
Chinese: 很明显，岩笠和女孩没聊到一起。因为登山的疲惫，女孩渐渐睡了过去。

English:
*Iwakasa
…Hey… wake up.
Chinese:
*岩笠
……醒……醒一醒。

English:
*Girl
…Huh…? Did I… fall asleep…?
Chinese:
*女孩
……嗯……我这是？睡过去了吗……

English:
*Iwakasa
It seems something happened while we slept.
Chinese:
*岩笠
看起来，在我们睡着的时候发生了什么。

English: [b]The girl looked around, terrified by the hellish sight—a sea of blood littered with soldiers’ corpses.[/b]
Chinese:
[b]女孩环顾四周，被这地狱一般的景象吓到了。
到处都是士兵的尸体，周围已经变成了一片血的海洋。[/b]

English:
*Iwakasa
This doesn’t seem like a safe place to linger. I’ll dispose of the elixir on another mountain.
We should leave. Follow me if you insist.
Chinese:
*岩笠
看起来这里不是一个可以久留的地方，我还是去另一座山处理这个药吧。
我们该走了，如果你还想要继续跟着我，就随你吧。

English:
On the way down, the girl couldn’t stop thinking about Iwakasa’s words.
The elixir of immortality—the fabled Hourai Elixir—was now within her grasp.
Chinese:
下山的路上，女孩满脑子都是岩笠说的话。
蓬莱之药，不老不死的灵药，现在就在她的面前。

English:
When she snapped back to her senses, she had already kicked Iwakasa down the steep slope, snatched the jar, and fled.
From that moment on, no one ever saw her again.
Chinese:
当女孩再次回过神来的时候，已经向在陡峭的下坡走着的岩笠背后狠狠地踹去，然后一把抢过那个壶逃掉了。
从那个时候开始，就再没有人见过她的身影了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Alright, the story ends here.
Phew… that was quite a long tale.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
好，故事到这里就结束了。
呼~真是一个漫长的故事呢。

English:
It sounds… like a very sad story.
I wonder what happened to the girl in the end. I hope she found peace.
Chinese:
听起来，是一个很悲伤的故事呢……
不知道故事最后的女孩怎么样了，真希望她能好好的活着啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
—I’m sure she’s… still living on.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
——是啊，一定好好地活着吧。

English: [b]Mokou gazed silently at the moon overhead.[/b]
Chinese: [b]妹红抬头望着天上的月亮，不再说话了。[/b]

English: [b](Fujiwara no Mokou stands silently by the fire, staring blankly into the flames.)[/b]
Chinese: [b]（藤原妹红静静地站在火堆旁，盯着篝火怔怔地发愣）[/b]

English: Miss Mokou, you’re alone again.
Chinese: 妹红小姐，你又在一个人呆着了啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
When you live long enough, solitude becomes a habit. I prefer to think alone.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
人活得久了，总会变得孤寂，喜欢自己一个人呆着想事情嘛。

English:
But you don’t look that old…
What are you thinking about, then?
Chinese:
我看妹红小姐你也没多大嘛……
那妹红小姐又在一个人想着什么呢。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Let me ask you a question, Lucy.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
这样，我问你一个问题吧，露西。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
If you could gain immortality, what would you do? Would you choose it?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
如果你可以获得不老不死的力量，你会怎么做？你会选择获得这份力量吗？

English: Of course I would! It’s eternal life!
Chinese: 当然会选择获得这份力量的吧？这可是能不老不死啊。

English: With immortality, I could do so much—help so many people.
Chinese: 有了这份力量，我就可以做到很多很多的事情，帮助更多的人们了啊。

English: I could go anywhere, see everything. It’d be wonderful.
Chinese: 我还可以去到任何我想去的地方，看到不同的风景，多好啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
You’re too optimistic, Lucy.
Immortality isn’t the blessing you imagine…
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
露西你真是乐观呢。
不老不死可不是什么你想象里这么美好的东西啊……

English: I… don’t think I’d choose it.
Chinese: 我想，我应该不会选择这份力量吧。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Oh? Why? It’s the power to never die.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
哦？为什么呢？这可是不会死去的力量啊。

English:
How do I put this… Even if death is gone, the pain of life remains.
I don’t think I could endure that forever.
Chinese:
该怎么说呢……虽然我也知道这份力量非常强大，但是如果人不会死了，经历过的种种痛苦，都不会忘记的吧。
我不觉得我能一直承受着那些痛苦活下去。

English: Of course I would.
Chinese: 当然会的吧。

English: I wouldn’t choose it.
Chinese: 我不会选择这份力量。

English: Miss Mokou… that story you told earlier—it’s your own, isn’t it?
Chinese: 妹红小姐你上次说的故事，其实就是你自己的故事吧。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Well, I wasn’t hiding it.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
嘛，我也没打算隐瞒就是了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
For me, this power is a curse—a penance for sins I must atone for.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
对我来说，这份力量确实是一种诅咒，是我为了赎回以前犯下的罪孽而不得不承受的。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
A body that never ages, yet cannot die… can this still be called “human”?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
不会老去，也不被允许死去的这具身躯，真的还能被称作“人”吗……

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
No wonder people fear and avoid me. I’m not even human anymore.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
人们惧怕我，远离我也是理所应当的吧，毕竟我连人都算不上啊。

English: But even so, you always protect everyone around you.
Chinese: 但是，就算这样妹红小姐不还是一直在保护着周围的人吗？

English: Not just me—whenever others are in danger, you shield them without hesitation.
Chinese: 不仅仅是我，其他的调查员也是，大家陷入危险的时候，妹红小姐都会毫不犹豫地挡住我们面前承受攻击啊。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Well… being immortal means minor injuries are trivial.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
嘛……毕竟因为我是不死的，这一点点小伤不算什么。

English:
But you still feel pain.
You never care for yourself. Even if you don’t, think about those who worry for you.
Chinese:
但即使是这样，妹红小姐也还是能感受到痛的吧。
你总是不珍惜自己的身体呢，就算你不为了自己着想，也为了身边这些担心着你的人想想吧。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
…Fine. I’ll be more careful next time.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
嘛……你这么说的话，我下次会注意的。

English: Miss Mokou… are you okay?
Chinese: 妹红小姐……你还好吗？

English:
*Mokou
Don’t worry about me.
Check on the others—they seem unwell.
Chinese:
*妹红
不用担心我。
你还是去关心别的调查员吧，他们看起来状态不太对。

English:
I will…
But you’re being too calm.
Chinese:
我当然会这么做……
但是你看起来有点太过冷静了。

English:
*Mokou
After speaking with Kaguya, I’ve faced my heart.
…Claiming I’m not anxious would be a lie.
Chinese:
*妹红
和辉夜对话之后，我终于直面了自己的内心。
…如果我说心里没有一点不安，那肯定是在说谎。

English:
*Mokou
But dwelling on it won’t bring answers. We must move forward.
Chinese:
*妹红
但就算我现在再苦恼也没有办法得到任何答案，还不如抱着疑问继续前进。

English:
*Mokou
…Everything will be alright. I believe that.
Chinese:
*妹红
…一切都会好起来的，我是如此地深信着。

English: Truthfully… I’m filled with doubts too.
Chinese: 其实…我的心中也怀抱着种种的不安。

English:
My father suffers endlessly… Azar is a traitor…
And the world keeps looping…
Chinese:
爸爸一直在受尽折磨……阿扎尔其实是叛徒……
还有世界一直在不断循环什么的。

English: So much information, the weight of saving the world—it’s all on me now…
Chinese: 一瞬间超大量的信息突然涌入我的脑海，拯救世界的重担突然就交到了我的手上……

English:
Will things truly get better…?
Even if I grasp hope, can I really move forward?
Chinese:
一切真的都会变好吗…。
即使抓住了希望的尾巴，但我自己真的可以就这么前进吗。

English: Honestly… I’m not confident.
Chinese: 说真的，我拿不出自信来呀。

English:
*Mokou
This burden is too heavy for a child.
It’s okay to give up if it’s too much.
Chinese:
*妹红
这一切，对你这个小孩子来说，都太过沉重了啊。
如果你撑不下去了，放弃也是可以的。

English:
If we count the loops, I’m over 500 years old—half your age.
I’m not a fragile child anymore.
Chinese:
硬要说的话，算上循环我也500多岁了，已经到了你的岁数的一半了。
我已经不是一个脆弱的小孩了。

English:
I haven’t seen a better future yet.
But we can still strive to reach it.
Chinese:
我还没能看到变得更好的未来。
我们都还能够试着去接近那个更好的未来。

English: No matter what, I’ll keep moving forward—to defeat Azar, to return to reality.
Chinese:
无论发生什么，我都会至死不渝地前进。
不管是打败阿扎尔，还是回到现实世界。

English:
*Mokou
…If you falter, rely on me.
I’m still your elder sister, after all.
Chinese:
*妹红
…如果你坚持不下去了，就来依靠我吧。
再怎么说，我还是比你大多了。我始终是你的姐姐。

English:
*Mokou
Press on, Lucy. As you always have.
I’ll protect you, no matter what.
Chinese:
*妹红
前进吧，露西，就像往常一样。
无论发生什么事情，我都会保护着你的。

English:
[y]Fujiwara no Mokou[g] refuses to listen. She will not aid you.
[sys](※ Insufficient tokens or unmet conditions. Try letting Mokou meet Kaguya?)）
Chinese:
[y]藤原妹红[g]并不想听你说任何话，她绝对不会帮助你任何事情。
[sys]（※ 信物不足或未满足特定条件。尝试去让妹红去和辉夜见上一面？）

English:
*Mokou
Life. Life. Life.
The origin of life is darkness.
Chinese:
*妹红
生 生 生
生的开始 即是黑暗

English:
*Mokou
Death. Death. Death.
The end of death is oblivion.
Chinese:
*妹红
死 死 死
死的终结 即是幽冥

English:
*Mokou
Are we… about to oppose the entire world?
Chinese:
*妹红
我们，接下来是要与这个世界为敌吗？

English:
If we return to reality, everyone here will die.    
By that logic… yes.
Chinese:
如果选择回到现实，这里的所有人都会死。
按这个逻辑思考的话，确实是这样的吧。

English:
*Mokou
So… choosing to return to reality means we’ll “die”?
Chinese:
*妹红
也就是说，只要我们选择回到现实，就会“死”吗……

English:
Yes. This must be hard for you…
To truly die, despite your immortality…
Chinese:
嗯，是这样的。……对你来说，这很难接受吧。
明明是不死之身，却还会真的死去……

English:
*Mokou
No, Lucy, you misunderstand.
I told you before—I consumed the Hourai Elixir, became an immortal, and gained this undying body.
Chinese:
*妹红
不，露西，你没有明白。
我以前和你讲过故事，我吃下了蓬莱之药，变成了蓬莱人，成了不死之身。

English:
*Mokou
…Do you know what immortals desire most?
Chinese:
*妹红
……你知道对于蓬莱人最想要的，是什么吗？

English: I don’t know. (Shakes head)
Chinese: 不知道（摇头）

English:
*Mokou
…Death.
Chinese:
*妹红
……是死亡。

English:
*Mokou
Immortals cannot die. Even if our bodies are destroyed, our souls endure.
Given time, we will regenerate.
Chinese:
*妹红
蓬莱人是不会死去的，即使肉身破灭，灵魂依旧会存在。
只需要经过一段时间，我们就会重生。

English:
*Mokou
What happens when you’re trapped in a world where death is impossible?
Chinese:
*妹红
那么，如果你处在一个死不掉的环境中，会怎么样呢？

English:
*Mokou
…Endless suffering and torment.
Chinese:
*妹红
……答案是无尽的痛苦与折磨。

English:
*Mokou
Immortality is a curse upon us—a sin to bear.
Chinese:
*妹红
不老不死对我们来说更是一种诅咒，是一种罪孽。

English:
*Mokou
…To truly die would be salvation.
Chinese:
*妹红
…如果真的能死去的话，对我们来说反而是一场救赎。

English:
*Mokou
But Lucy… are you truly prepared?
This is real death.
Chinese:
*妹红
反倒是露西你，真的没事吗？
这可是真的死亡啊。

English:
I understand what it means. But it’s alright.
I now fully grasp what returning to reality entails—and what I must do.
Chinese:
我当然明白这意味着什么。但是没关系的。
现在的我已经彻底明白回到现实世界意味着什么，我应该做什么。

English: This virtual world, and all of us born within it… our existence has meaning. We are not sacrifices.
Chinese: 这个虚拟世界，以及在虚拟世界中诞生的我们，一切的存在都是有意义的，我们绝对不是牺牲品。

English: Even the “me” in reality would think this way—because I am still me.
Chinese: 即使是现实中的“我”，肯定也是这么想的吧，因为“我”就是我啊。

English: Even if I vanish, “I” will keep striving to find purpose and meaning.
Chinese: 即使我的存在消失了，“我”也一定会为了寻找它的价值与意义而不断前进吧。

English: I won’t let the Master destroy any of this!
Chinese: 我是绝对不会允许管理员破坏这一切的！

English:
*Mokou
…True. I’ve lived a vibrant life. If the “me” outside can’t experience the same, wouldn’t that be a waste?
Chinese:
*妹红
……是啊，我已经体验过了五彩斑斓的生活，如果不能让外面那个“我”也体验到这样的生活，不就亏大发了吗。

English:
*Mokou
This is the final battle.
Let’s fight—for our sake—to the very end!
Chinese:
*妹红
这就是最后一战了吧。
让我们，为了“我们”自己，奋战到底吧！

English:
*Mokou
I don’t know what ending awaits us.
But if we don’t move forward, we’ll never reach any ending.
Chinese:
*妹红
我不知道我们将面对的是一个怎样的结局。
但是如果我们不前进，就永远也抵达不了结局了不是吗。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
This…
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
这…………

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Why… am I…
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
我……为什么……

English: …Are you okay, Miss Mokou?
Chinese: ……你还好吗？妹红小姐。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
Lucy—what did you show me?!
What… was that vision…?
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
露西，你到底给我看了什么！
我看到的，又到底是什么……

English: I don’t know what you saw…
Chinese: 虽然我不知道你看到了什么东西……

English:
But the Archives hold only truth.
What you witnessed… is the real you in reality.
Chinese:
但档案馆里的东西都是真实的。
你所看到的东西，就是现实里的你真正的样子。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
[sh]Th-This… This can’t be real!
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
[sh]这……这……这怎么可能！

English: To return to reality, you must know the truth of this world and accept it…
Chinese: 为了回到现实世界，要让你们也知道这个世界的真相，做好接受现实的准备…

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou
[sh]Silence!!
You have no idea what my fate truly is!!
Chinese:
*藤原妹红
[sh]闭嘴！！
你根本不知道，我的结局会是什么样！！

English:
*Lucy
M-Mokou? Are… are you really okay…?
Chinese:
*露西
妹，妹红？你…你真的还好吧……

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou (?)
Don’t call me Mokou. I’m not her.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红（？）
别叫我妹红，我根本就不是妹红。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou (?)
Forgive me, Lucy. I won’t assist you further.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红（？）
抱歉，露西。接下来的事我不会再帮你了。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou (?)
If you need help, seek another investigator.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红（？）
如果你确实需要调查员的帮助，就去找找其他人吧。

English:
*Fujiwara no Mokou (?)
Leave me.
Let me be alone.
Chinese:
*藤原妹红（？）
别跟我说话了。
让我自己一个人静一静。

English: [b]Mokou seems deeply troubled.[/b]
Chinese: [b]妹红看起来非常困扰。[/b]
